column1: Daisy was the fourth daughter and eighth child of [[Samwise Gamgee]] and [[Rose Cotton]], born in {{SR

column2: Daisy]], a flower name, derives from [[Old English]] ''dæges eage'' "day's eye".<ref>[[Jim Allan]] (ed.), ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>  In [[Sindarin]], the name ''Daisy'' is ''Eirien''.<ref>{{SD
